## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G45650](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G45650)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtNPF2.7, NAXT1, NPF2.7</u>
- **Gene Name:** nitrate excretion transporter1, NRT1/ PTR family 2.7
- **Description:**   nitrate excretion transporter1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
